name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course equips students with the knowledge and theories they need to know in order to make sense of what they do in their own language course design as well as classroom practice. It also highlights the close relationship between language course design and teaching as the teacher builds on knowledge. Students will present and discuss the points of view of various practitioners and the professional community. They, therefore, are expected to finish the assigned readings before class and actively participate in class presentations and discussions.
